data.author: Victor Talpaert
data.message: Rename gnss.js to geolocation.js. Fix video framerate issue and removed show_video_preview parameter. The video label is now strict and no video streaming will be done if label is incorrect (saves battery as well).

data.author: Victor Talpaert
data.message: renamed JS side IMU to DeviceMotionOrientation. Interpretation is entirely on the server side, the client sends the data with the original names

Add separate frame_id for images and move video parameters to video.js. Add video compression parameter and empty frame check
